en.title: Pay your application fee
en.paragraph2: . Your application will not be submitted until you have paid.
en.line2: You will need a valid debit or credit card. If you cannot pay now, you will have to start the application again.

paymentError.title: There is a problem
paymentError.defaultPaymentError: Your application is not submitted. Please try again
paymentError.applicationNotSubmitted: Your payment was successful but you need to resubmit your application. If you are unable to submit the application, please contact the court with the case reference number {caseId}
paymentError.paymentUnsuccessful: Your payment was unsuccessful. Make the payment again and resubmit your application

cy.title: Pay your application fee (in welsh)
cy.paragraph1: The divorce application fee is £, (in welsh)
cy.paragraph2: .Your application will not be submitted until you have paid. (in Welsh)
cy.line2: You will need a valid debit or credit card. If you cannot pay now, you will have to start the application again. (in welsh)

paymentError.title: There is a problem (welsh)
paymentError.defaultPaymentError: Your application is not submitted. Please try again (welsh)
paymentError.applicationNotSubmitted: Your payment was successful but you need to resubmit your application. If you are unable to submit the application, please contact the court with the case reference number {caseId} (welsh)
paymentError.paymentUnsuccessful: Your payment was unsuccessful. Make the payment again and resubmit your application (welsh)
